meanings.definition: Able to be achieved or completed.
meanings.sent1: The task was accomplishable with a little effort.
meanings.sent2: Setting realistic goals makes them accomplishable.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat found catching the laser pointer accomplishable.
meanings.sent4: Her dream of traveling the world seemed more accomplishable with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The recipe was so clear that baking the cake felt accomplishable.

meanings.sent1: With determination, any challenge is accomplishable.
meanings.sent2: The puzzle was accomplishable after a few hints.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a penguin flying is as accomplishable as a fish riding a bicycle.
meanings.sent4: His plan to start a business was as accomplishable as building a sandcastle.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak looked so close, yet still so accomplishable.
